mapper.select: SELECT ID1_CD AS cd , ID1_NM AS nm , ID1_SORT FROM CIS_ItemDepth GROUP BY ID1_CD, ID1_NM, ID1_SORT ORDER BY ID1_SORT
SELECT ID2_CD AS cd , ID2_NM AS nm , ID2_SORT FROM CIS_ItemDepth WHERE ID1_CD = #{cd1} GROUP BY ID2_CD, ID2_NM, ID2_SORT ORDER BY ID2_SORT
SELECT ID3_CD AS cd , ID3_NM AS nm , ID3_SORT FROM CIS_ItemDepth WHERE ID1_CD = #{cd1} AND ID2_CD = #{cd2} GROUP BY ID3_CD, ID3_NM, ID3_SORT ORDER BY ID3_SORT
SELECT CategoryCode1 AS cd, CategoryName1 AS nm FROM CIS_CisProductCategory GROUP BY CategoryCode1, CategoryName1 ORDER BY nm

SELECT CONCAT(CategoryCode1, CategoryCode2, CategoryCode3) AS cd, CategoryName3 AS nm FROM CIS_CisProductCategory WHERE CategoryCode1 = Substring(#{cd}, 1, 2) AND CategoryCode2 = '01' GROUP BY CategoryCode1, CategoryCode2, CategoryCode3, CategoryName3 ORDER BY nm

SELECT CONCAT(CategoryCode1, CategoryCode2, CategoryCode3, CategoryCode4, CategoryCode5) AS cd, CONCAT(CategoryName5, '(', CategoryName4, ')') AS nm FROM CIS_CisProductCategory WHERE CategoryCode1 = Substring(#{cd}, 1, 2) AND CategoryCode2 = Substring(#{cd}, 3, 2) AND CategoryCode3 = Substring(#{cd}, 7, 2) GROUP BY CategoryCode1, CategoryCode2, CategoryCode3, CategoryCode4, CategoryCode5, CategoryName4, CategoryName5 ORDER BY nm
